results.deck: Larian Studios is Belgium's largest and most succesfull developer and has been active since 1996
results.description: Larian's most succesful and widely acclaimed game franchise is the Divinity series which is made of the isometric RPGs Divine Divinity, Beyond Divinity and Divinity II: Ego Draconis which was released in 2009. Other games released by Larian Studios include The L.E.D. Wars and KetnetKick 1&2.
results.name: Larian Studios

game.name: Divinity II: The Dragon Knight Saga

concept.name: Released Between Christmas and New Year's Day
